title: Purchasing RP with Amazon gift cards ?
body: I bought a 25 Euros Amazon gift card , and I have no idea how to buy RP with it , any help ?

replies.body: Amazon should have a section to purchase RP cards as a digital download.  I can't guarantee that it will be available in any region, though.  Just be sure it's for the region you're on, if available!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3V6MtRXo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-02T21:43:51.202+0000)
>
> Amazon should have a section to purchase RP cards as a digital download.  I can't guarantee that it will be available in any region, though.  Just be sure it's for the region you're on, if available!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/IHDAGTv.png[/img]
okay here's what I got in Germany , I changed region to USA to check , but there is no Amazon section

Aha!  You'll have to go directly to Amazon's website to see if they have a digital purchase available.  If so, your purchase should also offer a code you can redeem in the client store.  Sorry for the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3V6MtRXo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-02T22:42:07.079+0000)

I do have the code from the Amazon card itself, is that what you mean?

Afraid not.  It's a purchase available through Amazon itself, not the back of a gift or money card.  It looks like that option might only be available in Canada and North America currently per our [RP Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224).  If you're attempting to buy an RP Code from Amazon on EUNE then you might be unable to find it.  Sorry, friend!

If you would like help looking for alternative methods, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can find some options for you!
